EmailTemplate.name: February Emails 2019.Labs Innovation 2-5-19 & 2-25-19
EmailTemplate.subject: 2/28/19 Webinar - How to Drive More Value From Innovation Initiatives
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join us for the webinar How to Drive More Value From Innovation Initiatives <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/feb-28-how-to-drive-more-value-from-innovation-initiatives-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=innovation-labs&utm_term=q119]]>, on February 28, 2019.
Speed to value is critical for businesses to outpace their competition. Learn how your team or organization can leverage proven, modern product development best practices to win in today’s market.
Join Lauren Gilchrist and Paul Choi to gain insights on how to deliver more value to customers and better partner with your IT organization. We’ll share software development best practices and methodologies that have been used to help organizations adapt and thrive in today's digital markets.
In this webinar, you’ll learn:
- How Fortune 2000 companies can compete with startups and build more desirable and usable products
- How to realize value faster and more sustainably
- How to decrease risk and reduce waste in building your application
Presenters: Lauren Gilchrist, Director, Pivotal Labs Paul Choi, Sr. Director, Pivotal Labs
Date: Thursday, February 28, 2019 Time: 10:00am PST / 1:00pm EST
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/feb-28-how-to-drive-more-value-from-innovation-initiatives-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=innovation-labs&utm_term=q119]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
© 2019 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=875+Howard+Street&entry=gmail&source=g]]>, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA.
